General.Name: Susglobal Energy Corp
General.Description: SusGlobal Energy Corp., a renewable energy company, focuses on acquiring, developing, and monetizing a portfolio of proprietary technologies in the waste to energy and regenerative products application. It serves municipalities in rural and urban centers in Ontario, Canada. SusGlobal Energy Corp. was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 200 Davenport Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5R 1J2
